note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is [age-standardized](#dod:age_standardized).
title: Death rate from cardiomyopathy, myocarditis and endocarditis
subtitle: Estimated annual death rate from [cardiomyopathy](#dod:cardiomyopathy), [myocarditis](#dod:myocarditis) and [endocarditis](#dod:endocarditis) combined, per 100,000 people in the population.
variantName: WHO Global Health Estimates, age-standardized, estimated
